section.title: SuperTux
section.p: Lastest version of SuperTux is 0.0.5, released in December 23, 2003. Get it from: here.
The development version can be getted via CVS with the following command: cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/super-tux co supertux
We hope you like it! - SuperTux authors
